verbs.description: astronomers [V: may] now fully understand why the sky is dark at night astronomers used to think the universe contained about 100 billion galaxies that could be off by at least 10-fold hubble space telescope edwin hubble netherlands andromeda galaxy sky the astrophysical journal leiden observatory nasa olbers christopher conselice
